table.name: vtiger_prodcat
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_prodcat` ( `catid` int(11) NOT NULL, `catname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `catno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `categorytype` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`catid`), KEY `catno` (`catno`), KEY `categorytype` (`categorytype`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_prodcatcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_prodcatcf` ( `catid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`catid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
